+HPhsr.description: A button that will start a new game.

Anti-Intellectual Revolution.Description.defaultMessage: FOR : After a player researches a technology, they must destroy 1 of their non-fighter ships.\n\nAGAINST : At the start of the next strategy phase, each player chooses and exhausts 1 planet for each technology they own.
Anti-Intellectual Revolution.Description.description: Description for Agenda Card: Anti-Intellectual Revolution

Anti-Intellectual Revolution.Title.description: Title of Agenda Card: Anti-Intellectual Revolution

Archived Secret.Description.description: Description for Agenda Card: Archived Secret

Archived Secret.Title.description: Title of Agenda Card: Archived Secret

Armed Forces Standardization.Description.defaultMessage: The elected player places command tokens from their reinforcements so that they have 3 tokens in their tactic pool, 3 tokens in their fleet pool and 2 tokens in their strategy pool. They return any excess tokens to their reinforcements.
Armed Forces Standardization.Description.description: Description for Agenda Card: Armed Forces Standardization

Armed Forces Standardization.Title.description: Title of Agenda Card: Armed Forces Standardization

Arms Reduction.Description.defaultMessage: FOR : Each player destroys all but 2 of their dreadnaughts and all but 4 of their cruisers.\n\nAGAINST : At the start of the next strategy phase, each player exhausts each of their planets that have a technology specialty.
Arms Reduction.Description.description: Description for Agenda Card: Arms Reduction

Arms Reduction.Title.description: Title of Agenda Card: Arms Reduction

Articles of War.Description.defaultMessage: FOR : All mechs lose their printed abilities except for SUSTAIN DAMAGE.\n\nAGAINST : Each player that voted "For" gains 3 trade goods.
Articles of War.Description.description: Description for Agenda Card: Articles of War

Articles of War.Title.description: Title of Agenda Card: Articles of War

Checks and Balances.Description.defaultMessage: FOR : When a player chooses a strategy card during the strategy phase, they give that strategy card to another player that does not have 1 (or a player that does not have 2 in a three- or four-player game), if able.\n\nAGAINST : Each player readies only 3 of their planets at the end of this agenda phase.
Checks and Balances.Description.description: Description for Agenda Card: Checks and Balances

Checks and Balances.Title.description: Title of Agenda Card: Checks and Balances

Clandestine Operations.Description.defaultMessage: FOR : Each player removes 2 command tokens from their command sheet and returns those tokens to their reinforcements.\n\nAGAINST : Each player removes 1 command token from their fleet pool and returns that token to their reinforcements.
Clandestine Operations.Description.description: Description for Agenda Card: Clandestine Operations

Clandestine Operations.Title.description: Title of Agenda Card: Clandestine Operations

Classified Document Leaks.Description.defaultMessage: When this agenda is revealed, if there are no scored secret objectives, discard this card and reveal another agenda from the top of the deck.\n\nThe elected secret objective becomes a public objective; place it near the other public objectives in the common play area.
Classified Document Leaks.Description.description: Description for Agenda Card: Classified Document Leaks

Classified Document Leaks.Title.description: Title of Agenda Card: Classified Document Leaks

Colonial Redistribution.Description.defaultMessage: Destroy each unit on the elected planet.\n\nThen, the player who controls that planet chooses 1 player with the fewest victory points; that player may place 1 infantry from their reinforcements on the elected planet.
Colonial Redistribution.Description.description: Description for Agenda Card: Colonial Redistribution

Colonial Redistribution.Title.description: Title of Agenda Card: Colonial Redistribution

Committee Formation.Description.defaultMessage: The elected player gains this card.\n\nBefore players vote on an agenda that requires a player to be elected, the owner of this card may discard this card to choose a player to be elected. Players do not vote on that agenda.
Committee Formation.Description.description: Description for Agenda Card: Committee Formation

Committee Formation.Title.description: Title of Agenda Card: Committee Formation

Compensated Disarmament.Description.defaultMessage: Destroy each ground force on the elected planet; for each unit that was destroyed, the player who controls that planet gains 1 trade good.
Compensated Disarmament.Description.description: Description for Agenda Card: Compensated Disarmament

Compensated Disarmament.Title.description: Title of Agenda Card: Compensated Disarmament

Conventions of War.Description.defaultMessage: FOR : Players cannot use BOMBARDMENT against units that are on cultural planets.\n\nAGAINST : Each player that voted "Against" discards all of their action cards.
Conventions of War.Description.description: Description for Agenda Card: Conventions of War

Conventions of War.Title.description: Title of Agenda Card: Conventions of War

Core Mining.Description.defaultMessage:
Attach this card to the elected planet's card.

Then, destroy 1 infantry on the planet.

The resource value of this planet is increased by 2.
Core Mining.Description.description: Description for Agenda Card: Core Mining

Core Mining.Title.description: Title of Agenda Card: Core Mining

Covert Legislation.Description.defaultMessage: When this agenda is revealed, the speaker draws the next card in the agenda deck but does not reveal it to the other players.\n\nInstead, the speaker reads the eligible outcomes aloud (For, Against, Elect Player, etc.); the other players vote for these outcomes as if they were outcomes of this agenda, without knowing their effects.
Covert Legislation.Description.description: Description for Agenda Card: Covert Legislation

Covert Legislation.Title.description: Title of Agenda Card: Covert Legislation

Demilitarized Zone.Description.defaultMessage:
Attach this card to the elected planet's card.

Then, destroy all units on that planet.

Player's units cannot land, be produced, or be placed on this planet.
Demilitarized Zone.Description.description: Description for Agenda Card: Demilitarized Zone

Demilitarized Zone.Title.description: Title of Agenda Card: Demilitarized Zone

Economic Equality.Description.defaultMessage: FOR : Each player returns all of their trade goods to the supply. Then, each player gains 5 trade goods.\n\nAGAINST : Each player returns all of their trade goods to the supply.
Economic Equality.Description.description: Description for Agenda Card: Economic Equality

Economic Equality.Title.description: Description for Agenda Card: Economic Equality

Enforced Travel Ban.Description.defaultMessage: FOR : Alpha and beta wormholes have no effect during movement.\n\nAGAINST : Destroy each PDS in or adjacent to a system that contains a wormhole.
Enforced Travel Ban.Description.description: Description for Agenda Card: Enforced Travel Ban

Enforced Travel Ban.Title.description: Title of Agenda Card: Enforced Travel Ban

Executive Sanctions.Description.defaultMessage: FOR : Each player can have a maximum of 3 action cards in their hand.\n\nAGAINST : Each player discards 1 random action card from their hand.
Executive Sanctions.Description.description: Description for Agenda Card: Executive Sanctions

Executive Sanctions.Title.description: Title of Agenda Card: Executive Sanctions

Fleet Regulations.Description.defaultMessage: FOR : Each player cannot have more than 4 tokens in their fleet pool.\n\nAGAINST : Each player places 1 command token from their reinforcements in their fleet pool.
Fleet Regulations.Description.description: Description for Agenda Card: Fleet Regulations

Fleet Regulations.Title.description: Title of Agenda Card: Fleet Regulations

Galactic Crisis Pact.Description.defaultMessage: Each player may perform the secondary ability of the elected strategy card without spending a command token; command tokens placed by the ability are placed from a player's reinforcements instead.
Galactic Crisis Pact.Description.description: Description for Agenda Card: Galactic Crisis Pact

Galactic Crisis Pact.Title.description: Title of Agenda Card: Galactic Crisis Pact

Holy Planet of Ixth.Description.defaultMessage:
Attach this card to the elected planet's card.

The planet's owner gains 1 victory point.

Units on this planet cannot use PRODUCTION.

When a player gains control of this planet, they gain 1 victory point.

When a player loses control of this planet, they lose 1 victory point.
Holy Planet of Ixth.Description.description: Description for Agenda Card: Holy Planet of Ixth

Holy Planet of Ixth.Title.description: Title of Agenda Card: Holy Planet of Ixth

Homeland Defense Act.Description.defaultMessage: FOR : Each player can have any number of PDS units on planets they control.\n\nAGAINST : Each player destroys 1 of their PDS units.
Homeland Defense Act.Description.description: Description for Agenda Card: Homeland Defense Act

Homeland Defense Act.Title.description: Title of Agenda Card: Homeland Defense Act

Imperial Arbiter.Description.defaultMessage: The elected player gains this card.\n\nAt the end of the strategy phase, the owner of this card may discard this card to swap 1 of their strategy cards with 1 of another player's strategy cards.
Imperial Arbiter.Description.description: Description for Agenda Card: Imperial Arbiter

Imperial Arbiter.Title.description: Title of Agenda Card: Imperial Arbiter

Incentive Program.Description.defaultMessage: FOR : Draw and reveal 1 stage I public objective from the deck and place it near the public objectives.\n\nAGAINST : Draw and reveal 1 stage II public objective from the deck and place it near the public objectives.
Incentive Program.Description.description: Description for Agenda Card: Incentive Program

Incentive Program.Title.description: Title for Agenda Card: Incentive Program

Ixthian Artifact.Description.defaultMessage: FOR : The speaker rolls 1 die. If the result is 6-10, each player may research 2 technologies. If the result is 1-5, destroy all units in Mecatol Rex's system, and each player with units in systems adjacent to Mecatol Rex's system destroys 3 of their units in each of those systems.\n\nAGAINST : No effect.
Ixthian Artifact.Description.description: Description for Agenda Card: Ixthian Artifact

Ixthian Artifact.Title.description: Title of Agenda Card: Ixthian Artifact

Judicial Abolishment.Description.defaultMessage: When this agenda is revealed, if there are no laws in play, discard this card and reveal another agenda from the top of the deck.\n\nDiscard the elected law from play.
Judicial Abolishment.Description.description: Description for Agenda Card: Judicial Abolishment

Judicial Abolishment.Title.description: Title of Agenda Card: Judicial Abolishment

Minister of Antiques.Description.description: Description for Agenda Card: Minister of Antiques

Minister of Antiques.Title.description: Title of Agenda Card: Minister of Antiques

Minister of Commerce.Description.defaultMessage: The elected player gains this card.\n\nAfter the owner of this card replenishes commodities, they gain 1 trade good for each player that is their neighbor.
Minister of Commerce.Description.description: Description for Agenda Card: Minister of Commerce

Minister of Commerce.Title.description: Title of Agenda Card: Minister of Commerce

Minister of Exploration.Description.defaultMessage: The elected player gains this card.\n\nWhen the owner of this card gains control of a planet, they gain 1 trade good.
Minister of Exploration.Description.description: Description for Agenda Card: Minister of Exploration

Minister of Exploration.Title.description: Title of Agenda Card: Minister of Exploration

Minister of Industry.Description.defaultMessage: The elected player gains this card.\n\nWhen the owner of this card places a space dock in a system, their units in that system may use their PRODUCTION abilities.
Minister of Industry.Description.description: Description for Agenda Card: Minister of Industry

Minister of Industry.Title.description: Title of Agenda Card: Minister of Industry

Minister of Peace.Description.defaultMessage: The elected player gains this card.\n\nAfter a player activates a system that contains 1 or more of a different player's units, the owner of this card may discard this card; immediately end the active player's turn.
Minister of Peace.Description.description: Description for Agenda Card: Minister of Peace

Minister of Peace.Title.description: Title of Agenda Card: Minister of Peace

Minister of Policy.Description.defaultMessage: The elected player gains this card.\n\nAt the end of the status phase, the owner of this card draws 1 action card.
Minister of Policy.Description.description: Description for Agenda Card: Minister of Policy

Minister of Policy.Title.description: Title of Agenda Card: Minister of Policy

Minister of Sciences.Description.defaultMessage: The elected player gains this card.\n\nWhen the owner of this card resolves the primary or secondary ability of the "Technology" strategy card, they do not need to spend resources to research technology.
Minister of Sciences.Description.description: Description for Agenda Card: Minister of Sciences

Minister of Sciences.Title.description: Title of Agenda Card: Minister of Sciences

Minister of War.Description.defaultMessage: The elected player gains this card.\n\nThe owner of this card may discard this card after performing an action to remove 1 of their command counters from the game board and return it to their reinforcements; then they may perform 1 additional action.
Minister of War.Description.description: Description for Agenda Card: Minister of War

Minister of War.Title.description: Title of Agenda Card: Minister of War

Miscount Disclosed.Description.defaultMessage: When this agenda is revealed, if there are no laws in play, discard this card and reveal another agenda from the top of the deck.\n\nVote on the elected law as if it were just revealed from the top of the deck.
Miscount Disclosed.Description.description: Description for Agenda Card: Miscount Disclosed

Miscount Disclosed.Title.description: Title of Agenda Card: Miscount Disclosed

Mutiny.Description.defaultMessage: FOR : Each player who voted "For" gains 1 victory point.\n\nAGAINST : Each player who voted "For" loses 1 victory point.

New Constitution.Description.defaultMessage:
When this agenda is revealed, if there are no laws in play, discard this card and reveal another agenda from the top of the deck.

FOR : Discard all laws in play. At the start of the next strategy phase, each player exhausts each planet in their home system.

AGAINST : No effect.
New Constitution.Description.description: Description for Agenda Card: New Constitution

New Constitution.Title.description: Title of Agenda Card: New Constitution

Nexus Sovereignty.Description.defaultMessage: FOR : Alpha and beta wormholes in the wormhole nexus have no effect during movement.\n\nAGAINST : Place a gamma wormhole token in the Mecatol Rex system.
Nexus Sovereignty.Description.description: Description for Agenda Card: Nexus Sovereignty

Nexus Sovereignty.Title.description: Title of Agenda Card: Nexus Sovereignty

Political Censure.Description.defaultMessage:
The elected player gains this card and 1 victory point.

The elected player cannot play action cards.

If the owner of this card loses this card, they lose 1 victory point.
Political Censure.Description.description: Description for Agenda Card: Political Censure

Political Censure.Title.description: Title of Agenda Card: Political Censure

Prophecy of Ixth.Description.defaultMessage: The elected player gains this card.\n\nThe owner of this card applies +1 to the result of their fighter's combat rolls. When the owner of this card uses PRODUCTION, they discard this card unless they produce 2 or more fighters.
Prophecy of Ixth.Description.description: Description for Agenda Card: Prophecy of Ixth

Prophecy of Ixth.Title.description: Title of Agenda Card: Prophecy of Ixth

Public Execution.Description.defaultMessage: The elected player discards all of their action cards. If they have the speaker token, they give it to the player on their left. The elected player cannot vote on any agendas during this agenda phase.
Public Execution.Description.description: Description for Agenda Card: Public Execution

Public Execution.Title.description: Title of Agenda Card: Public Execution

Publicize Weapon Schematics.Description.defaultMessage: FOR : If any player owns a war sun technology, all players may ignore all prerequisites on war sun technologies. All war suns lose SUSTAIN DAMAGE.\n\nAGAINST : Each player that owns a war sun technology discards all of their action cards.
Publicize Weapon Schematics.Description.description: Description for Agenda Card: Publicize Weapon Schematics

Publicize Weapon Schematics.Title.description: Title of Agenda Card: Publicize Weapon Schematics

Rearmament Agreement.Description.defaultMessage: FOR : Each player places 1 mech from their reinforcements on a planet they control in their home system.\n\nAGAINST : Each player replaces each of their mechs with 1 infantry from their reinforcements.
Rearmament Agreement.Description.description: Description for Agenda Card: Rearmament Agreement

Rearmament Agreement.Title.description: Title of Agenda Card: Rearmament Agreement

Regulated Conscription.Description.defaultMessage: FOR : When a player produces units, they produce only 1 fighter and infantry for its cost instead of 2.\n\nAGAINST : No effect.
Regulated Conscription.Description.description: Description for Agenda Card: Regulated Conscription

Regulated Conscription.Title.description: Title of Agenda Card: Regulated Conscription

Representative Government.Description.defaultMessage: FOR : Players cannot exhaust planets to cast votes during the agenda phase. Each player may cast 1 vote on each agenda instead.\n\nAGAINST : At the start of the next strategy phase, each player that voted "Against" exhausts all of their cultural planets.
Representative Government.Description.description: Description for Agenda Card: Representative Government

Representative Government.Omega.Descript.defaultMessage: FOR : Players cannot exhaust planets to cast votes during the agenda phase; each player may cast 1 vote on each agenda instead. Players cannot cast additional votes.\n\nAGAINST : At the start of the next strategy phase, each player that voted "Against" exhausts all of their cultural planets.
Representative Government.Omega.Descript.description: Omega description for Agenda Card: Representative Government

Representative Government.Title.description: Title of Agenda Card: Representative Government

Research Grant Reallocation.Description.defaultMessage: The elected player gains any 1 technology of their choice. Then, for each prerequisite on that technology, they remove 1 token from their fleet pool and return it to their reinforcements.
Research Grant Reallocation.Description.description: Description for Agenda Card: Research Grant Reallocation

Research Grant Reallocation.Title.description: Title of Agenda Card: Research Grant Reallocation

Research Team: Biotic.Description.defaultMessage: Attach this card to the elected planet's card.\n\nWhen the owner of this planet researches technology, they may exhaust this card to ignore 1 green prerequisite.
Research Team: Biotic.Description.description: Description for Agenda Card: Research Team: Biotic

Research Team: Biotic.Title.description: Title of Agenda Card: Research Team: Biotic

Research Team: Cybernetic.Description.defaultMessage: Attach this card to the elected planet's card.\n\nWhen the owner of this planet researches technology, they may exhaust this card to ignore 1 yellow prerequisite.
Research Team: Cybernetic.Description.description: Description for Agenda Card: Research Team: Cybernetic

Research Team: Cybernetic.Title.description: Title of Agenda Card: Research Team: Cybernetic

Research Team: Propulsion.Description.defaultMessage: Attach this card to the elected planet's card.\n\nWhen the owner of this planet researches technology, they may exhaust this card to ignore 1 blue prerequisite.
Research Team: Propulsion.Description.description: Description for Agenda Card: Research Team: Propulsion

Research Team: Propulsion.Title.description: Title of Agenda Card: Research Team: Propulsion

Research Team: Warfare.Description.defaultMessage: Attach this card to the elected planet's card.\n\nWhen the owner of this planet researches technology, they may exhaust this card to ignore 1 red prerequisite.
Research Team: Warfare.Description.description: Description for Agenda Card: Research Team: Warfare

Research Team: Warfare.Title.description: Title of Agenda Card: Research Team: Warfare

Search Warrant.Description.defaultMessage: The elected player gains this card and draws 2 secret objectives.\n\nThe owner of this card plays with their secret objectives revealed.
Search Warrant.Description.description: Description for Agenda Card: Search Warrant

Search Warrant.Title.description: Title of Agenda Card: Search Warrant

Seed of an Empire.Description.defaultMessage: FOR : The player with most victory points gains 1 victory point.\n\nAGAINST : The player with the fewest victory points gains 1 victory point.
Seed of an Empire.Description.description: Description for Agenda Card: Seed of an Empire

Seed of an Empire.Title.description: Title of Agenda Card: Seed of an Empire

Senate Sanctuary.Description.defaultMessage: Attach this card to the elected planet's card.\n\nThe influence value of this planet is increased by 2.
Senate Sanctuary.Description.description: Description for Agenda Card: Senate Sanctuary

Senate Sanctuary.Title.description: Title of Agenda Card: Senate Sanctuary

Shard of the Throne.Description.defaultMessage:
The elected player gains this card.

A player gains this card and 1 victory point when they win a combat against the owner of this card.

Then, the previous owner of this card loses 1 victory point.
Shard of the Throne.Description.description: Description for Agenda Card: Shard of the Throne

Shard of the Throne.Title.description: Title of Agenda Card: Shard of the Throne

Shared Research.Description.defaultMessage: FOR : Each player's units can move through nebulae.\n\nAGAINST : Each player places a command token from their reinforcements in their home system, if able.
Shared Research.Description.description: Description for Agenda Card: Shared Research

Shared Research.Title.description: Title of Agenda Card: Shared Research

Swords to Plowshares.Description.defaultMessage: FOR : Each player destroys half of their infantry on each planet they control, rounded up. Then, each player gains trade goods equal to the number of their infantry that were destroyed.\n\nAGAINST : Each player places 1 infantry from their reinforcements on each planet they control.
Swords to Plowshares.Description.description: Description for Agenda Card: Swords to Plowshares

Swords to Plowshares.Title.description: Title of Agenda Card: Swords to Plowshares

Terraforming Initiative.Description.defaultMessage: Attach this card to the elected planet's card.\n\nThe resource and influence values of this planet are increased by 1.
Terraforming Initiative.Description.description: Description for Agenda Card: Terraforming Initiative

Terraforming Initiative.Title.description: Title of Agenda Card: Terraforming Initiative

The Crown of Emphidia.Description.defaultMessage:
The elected player gains this card.

A player gains this card and 1 victory point after they gain control of a planet in the home system of this card's owner.

Then, the previous owner of this card loses 1 victory point.
The Crown of Emphidia.Description.description: Description for Agenda Card: The Crown of Emphidia

The Crown of Emphidia.Title.description: Title of Agenda Card: The Crown of Emphidia

The Crown of Thalnos.Description.defaultMessage: The elected player gains this card.\n\nDuring each combat round, the owner of this card may reroll any number of dice; they must destroy each of their units that did not produce a hit with its reroll.
The Crown of Thalnos.Description.description: Description for Agenda Card: The Crown of Thalnos

The Crown of Thalnos.Title.description: Title of Agenda Card: The Crown of Thalnos

Unconventional Measures.Description.defaultMessage: FOR : Each player that voted "For" draws 2 action cards.\n\nAGAINST : Each player that voted "For" discards all of their action cards.
Unconventional Measures.Description.description: Description for Agenda Card: Unconventional Measures

Unconventional Measures.Title.description: Title of Agenda Card: Unconventional Measures

Wormhole Reconstruction.Description.defaultMessage: FOR : All systems that contain either an alpha or beta wormhole are adjacent to each other.\n\nAGAINST : Each player places a command token from their reinforcements in each system that contains a wormhole and 1 or more of their ships.
Wormhole Reconstruction.Description.description: Description for Agenda Card: Wormhole Reconstruction

Wormhole Reconstruction.Title.description: Title of Agenda Card: Wormhole Reconstruction

Wormhole Research.Description.defaultMessage: FOR : Each player who has 1 or more ships in a system that contains a wormhole may research 1 technology. Then, destroy all ships in systems that contain an alpha or beta wormhole.\n\nAGAINST : Each player that voted "Against" removes 1 command token from their command sheet and returns it to their reinforcements.
Wormhole Research.Description.description: Description for Agenda Card: Wormhole Research

Wormhole Research.Title.description: Title of Agenda Card: Wormhole Research
